articles.title: Golf goes indoors on prime time with high-tech TGL league - The Associated Press
articles.description: Golf is moving indoors like never before. Xander Schauffele is among those making the debut of the TMRW Golf League next Tuesday night on ESPN. It features six teams of four players competing against each other in a tech-infused arena the size of a football f…
